item.name: Rusty Dagger
item.description: A simple dagger with a rusty blade, but it's better than nothing.

item.name: Small Healing Potion
item.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that can heal minor wounds.

item.name: Tavern Cellar Key
item.description: A small iron key that opens the cellar of the Drunken Dragon tavern.

town.name: Riverside Village
town.description: A peaceful village nestled by the Silver River. The buildings are made of sturdy timber with thatched roofs, and the villagers are known for their hospitality.

town_square.name: Town Square
town_square.description: The heart of Riverside Village. A large fountain sits in the center of the cobblestone square. Villagers come and go, some stopping to chat with their neighbors. Shops line the perimeter, and you can hear the distant sound of flowing water from the river.

items.name: Town Notice
items.description: A notice posted on the town bulletin board. It reads: 'MISSING: Supplies from the last merchant caravan. Anyone with information please speak to the Town Elder.'

tavern.name: The Drunken Dragon Tavern
tavern.description: A warm, inviting tavern with a large hearth at one end. The smell of roasting meat and fresh bread fills the air. Patrons sit at wooden tables, drinking ale and sharing stories. A staircase leads up to the guest rooms, and you notice a locked door behind the bar.

tavern_kitchen.name: Tavern Kitchen
tavern_kitchen.description: A bustling kitchen filled with the clatter of pots and pans. The air is thick with steam and the aroma of cooking food. A large oven dominates one wall.

items.name: Hunk of Bread
items.description: A thick slice of fresh, crusty bread.

tavern_rooms.name: Tavern Upper Floor
tavern_rooms.description: A narrow hallway with several doors leading to guest rooms. The floor creaks underfoot, and you can hear the muffled sounds of conversation from below.

items.name: Traveler's Journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with entries from a merchant who passed through the village. The last entry mentions strange noises in the forest at night and missing supplies.

guest_room_1.name: Guest Room (North)
guest_room_1.description: A simple but clean guest room containing a bed, a small table, and a washbasin. The window looks out over the tavern's back alley.

guest_room_2.name: Guest Room (South)
guest_room_2.description: This guest room is slightly larger, with a sturdy chest at the foot of the bed. A faded tapestry hangs on one wall.

items.name: Lost Earring
items.description: A small silver earring, likely forgotten by a previous guest.

tavern_cellar.name: Tavern Cellar
tavern_cellar.description: A cool, damp cellar beneath the tavern, smelling strongly of ale and earth. Barrels are stacked against the walls, and sacks of grain sit on wooden pallets. A sturdy, locked door blocks entry.

items.name: Barrel of Ale
items.description: A large wooden barrel, full of the Drunken Dragon's signature ale.

market.name: Village Market
market.description: The busy market area where villagers trade goods. Stalls sell everything from fresh produce to handcrafted goods. The air is filled with the shouts of merchants and the scent of spices.

general_store.name: General Store
general_store.description: A well-stocked shop with goods of all kinds. Shelves line the walls, filled with tools, preserved foods, clothing, and sundries. The shopkeeper keeps a careful eye on all the merchandise.

storage_room.name: Store Storage Room
storage_room.description: A cramped storage room behind the general store, filled with crates, sacks, and barrels. Dust motes dance in the dim light filtering through a small window.

items.name: Empty Crate
items.description: A sturdy wooden crate, currently empty.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith's Forge
blacksmith.description: The heat from the forge hits you as you enter. The rhythmic sound of hammer on anvil rings through the air. Weapons and tools hang on the walls, and the blacksmith works tirelessly at their craft.

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A well-crafted iron sword with a leather-wrapped hilt. The blade is sharp and balanced.

east_lane.name: East Lane
east_lane.description: A narrow lane running behind the market and tavern. Laundry lines stretch between windows, and stray cats dart through the shadows.

items.name: Bent Coin
items.description: A copper coin, bent almost in half. Worthless now.

west_lane.name: West Lane
west_lane.description: A quiet lane bordering the blacksmith's forge and leading towards the residential part of town. Children's chalk drawings mark the cobblestones.

small_house.name: Small House
small_house.description: A modest timber-framed house with a small garden out front. The door is slightly ajar.

river_road.name: River Road
river_road.description: A wide dirt road that runs parallel to the Silver River. The sound of flowing water is louder here, and you can see boats moving along the river. Trees provide shade along the path.

old_mill_path.name: Path to Old Mill
old_mill_path.description: A less-used path branching off the main road, heading towards the sound of rushing water near an old structure.

old_mill.name: Abandoned Mill
old_mill.description: An old water mill stands silently beside the river, its large wheel still and covered in moss. The building looks structurally sound but unused.

riverside.name: Riverside Dock
riverside.description: A wooden dock extends into the river. Fishing boats are tied up, gently bobbing in the current. Fishermen sort their catches or repair nets, while river traders load and unload cargo. A sturdy stone bridge crosses the river to the east.

items.name: Fresh Fish
items.description: A recently caught fish, still fresh and glistening. It would make a good meal.

fishing_hut.name: Fishing Hut
fishing_hut.description: A small wooden hut near the docks, smelling strongly of fish. Nets hang drying outside, and fishing rods lean against the wall.

items.name: Fishing Net
items.description: A sturdy net used for catching fish.

forest.name: Whispering Woods
forest.description: A dense forest that borders Riverside Village. The trees grow tall and close together, creating a canopy that filters the sunlight. Local legends speak of strange creatures living in its depths.

forest_path.name: Forest Path
forest_path.description: A narrow path that winds between the trees. The forest is alive with the sounds of birds and rustling leaves. Shafts of sunlight break through the canopy overhead.

items.name: Forest Berries
items.description: A handful of wild berries growing along the path. They look edible.

stream_crossing.name: Stream Crossing
stream_crossing.description: A shallow stream bubbles over smooth stones, crossing the forest floor. Stepping stones offer a way across.

clearing.name: Forest Clearing
clearing.description: A peaceful clearing where the trees thin out. Wildflowers grow in the grassy area, and the sky is visible overhead. The clearing feels strangely serene compared to the rest of the forest.

thorny_thicket.name: Thorny Thicket
thorny_thicket.description: A dense thicket of thorny bushes blocks easy passage eastward. It looks difficult to push through.

dense_woods.name: Dense Woods
dense_woods.description: The forest grows denser here, with trees growing closer together. The path is harder to follow, and less light filters through the branches. The sounds of the forest seem more distant.

deep_forest_1.name: Deep Forest
deep_forest_1.description: You are deep within the Whispering Woods. Ancient trees loom overhead, and the ground is covered in thick moss. The way forward is unclear.

items.name: Strange Feather
items.description: A large, iridescent feather unlike any bird you know.

deep_forest_2.name: Deeper Forest
deep_forest_2.description: The forest feels ancient and slightly menacing here. Twisted roots cross the path, and shadows seem to dance at the edge of your vision.

ancient_tree.name: Ancient Oak
ancient_tree.description: A massive oak tree dominates this area, its trunk wider than several people standing together. Its roots spread out across the ground, and its branches reach high into the sky. There's a hollow at the base of the trunk.

items.name: Ancient Coin
items.description: A tarnished silver coin bearing unfamiliar markings. It appears to be very old and might be valuable to a collector.

abandoned_cabin.name: Abandoned Cabin
abandoned_cabin.description: A dilapidated wooden cabin that appears to have been abandoned for years. The door hangs off its hinges, and parts of the roof have fallen in. Despite its condition, it might provide shelter from the elements.

items.name: Torn Map
items.description: A torn piece of parchment showing a partial map of the region. There appears to be a marked location deep in the forest, but part of the map is missing.

items.name: Rusty Lantern
items.description: An old iron lantern, rusted and without fuel.

wolf_den.name: Wolf Den Entrance
wolf_den.description: A dark opening under a rocky outcrop, partially hidden by bushes. The ground is littered with bones, and a low growl emanates from within.

wolf_cave.name: Wolf Den Cave
wolf_cave.description: A cramped, foul-smelling cave. Bones and scraps of fur cover the floor. It serves as a den for a pack of forest wolves.

wolf_cave_back.name: Back of the Wolf Den
wolf_cave_back.description: The rear of the den is slightly larger, containing makeshift nests of leaves and fur. More bones are scattered about.

items.name: Chewed Bone
items.description: A large bone, thoroughly chewed.

caves.name: Shadow Caves
caves.description: A network of caves in the hills beyond the forest. Few villagers venture this far from town, and those who do tell tales of strange echoes and mysterious lights.

cave_entrance.name: Cave Entrance
cave_entrance.description: A dark opening in the hillside marks the entrance to the caves. Cool air flows out from the darkness within. Moss grows around the entrance, and you can hear water dripping somewhere inside.

main_cavern.name: Main Cavern
main_cavern.description: A large open space within the cave system. Stalactites hang from the ceiling, and the ground is uneven with rocks and small puddles. Your footsteps echo in the chamber. A hidden passage seems to lead southeast, while another winds north.

bat_cave.name: Bat Cave
bat_cave.description: The ceiling here is high and lost in shadow. The air is filled with the leathery flapping of wings and high-pitched squeaks. Guano covers the floor.

items.name: Pile of Guano
items.description: A large pile of bat droppings. Smells awful, but might be useful as fertilizer.

narrow_passage.name: Narrow Passage
narrow_passage.description: A tight corridor that winds between stone walls. You have to duck in places to avoid hitting your head. The passage feels claustrophobic, and the air is stale.

crawl_space.name: Tight Crawl Space
crawl_space.description: The passage becomes so narrow you must crawl on your hands and knees. Loose pebbles shift beneath you.

crystal_room.name: Crystal Chamber
crystal_room.description: This chamber is filled with crystalline formations that catch and reflect light in dazzling patterns. The crystals vary in color from clear to amethyst, creating an otherworldly beauty.

items.name: Glowing Crystal
items.description: A fist-sized crystal that emits a faint blue glow. It feels warm to the touch and seems to pulse with an inner light.

geode_cluster.name: Geode Cluster
geode_cluster.description: Several large, cracked-open geodes line the walls of this small alcove. Their hollow interiors sparkle with thousands of tiny crystals.

items.name: Crystal Shard
items.description: A sharp shard broken off from a larger crystal formation.

underground_pool.name: Underground Pool
underground_pool.description: The passage opens into a chamber with a still, dark pool of water. The surface is like a mirror, reflecting the stone ceiling above. The chamber is eerily quiet except for the occasional drip of water.

deep_tunnel.name: Deep Tunnel
deep_tunnel.description: This rough-hewn tunnel slopes steeply downwards into the earth. The air grows colder, and the silence is profound. Loose scree makes the footing treacherous.

lava_tube_entrance.name: Lava Tube Entrance
lava_tube_entrance.description: The rock here changes, becoming darker and smoother, resembling solidified lava. A tunnel leads deeper into this volcanic rock.

lava_tube.name: Lava Tube
lava_tube.description: A smooth, cylindrical tunnel formed by ancient lava flows. The air is still and surprisingly warm.

items.name: Obsidian Chunk
items.description: A piece of sharp, black volcanic glass.

flooded_passage.name: Flooded Passage
flooded_passage.description: Submerged in icy water, this passage connects the pool to deeper parts of the cave. You must hold your breath to pass through. Strange phosphorescent fungi provide a dim, eerie light.

submerged_chamber.name: Submerged Chamber
submerged_chamber.description: This small air pocket within the flooded passage offers a brief respite. Water drips constantly, and the air is thick with moisture. More glowing fungi cling to the walls.

items.name: Waterlogged Pouch
items.description: A small leather pouch, soaked through but seemingly intact. Perhaps something valuable remains inside.

forgotten_mine.name: Forgotten Mine Shaft
forgotten_mine.description: The tunnel opens into an old mine shaft, supported by rotting wooden beams. Pickaxes and discarded tools lie rusting on the ground. A rickety ladder ascends upwards into darkness.

items.name: Gold Nugget
items.description: A small, rough nugget of pure gold, likely missed by the original miners.

collapsed_tunnel.name: Collapsed Tunnel
collapsed_tunnel.description: This section of the mine has suffered a cave-in. Massive rocks block the way further south. Dust hangs heavy in the air.

hidden_passage.name: Hidden Passage
hidden_passage.description: This narrow passage seems intentionally constructed, connecting the main cavern system to somewhere else. It smells faintly of dust and decay.

ruins.name: Ancient Ruins
ruins.description: Deep within the Whispering Woods lie the crumbling remains of a long-forgotten civilization. Stone structures are overgrown with vines and moss, hinting at a mysterious past.

ruins_approach.name: Approach to the Ruins
ruins_approach.description: The trees thin slightly, revealing scattered, moss-covered stones - the first signs of ancient construction. The air feels heavy and still.

crumbling_wall.name: Crumbling Wall
crumbling_wall.description: A section of what was once a formidable stone wall lies before you, now breached in several places. Strange carvings are barely visible beneath the overgrowth.

overgrown_courtyard.name: Overgrown Courtyard
overgrown_courtyard.description: Once perhaps a garden or courtyard, this area is now choked with weeds, vines, and small trees growing between cracked paving stones.

items.name: Carved Stone Fragment
items.description: A piece of stone broken from a larger structure, bearing part of an intricate carving.

central_plaza.name: Central Plaza
central_plaza.description: A large, open plaza paved with cracked flagstones. In the center stands the base of a destroyed statue. Collapsed buildings surround the plaza, their purpose lost to time.

ritual_chamber.name: Ritual Chamber
ritual_chamber.description: This circular chamber has a large stone altar at its center, stained with something dark. Symbols are etched into the floor and walls.

shadowy_crypt.name: Shadowy Crypt Entrance
shadowy_crypt.description: A dark entryway leads down beneath the plaza. The air flowing out is cold and smells of dust and decay. Stone steps descend into blackness.

crypt_lower_level.name: Crypt Lower Level
crypt_lower_level.description: Stone sarcophagi line the walls of this underground chamber. Some are broken open, others remain sealed. Intricate patterns cover every surface. A faint draft suggests a hidden passage to the northwest.

items.name: Ancient Amulet
items.description: A heavy amulet made of an unknown black metal, set with a dull, unblinking gem.

flooded_tomb.name: Flooded Tomb
flooded_tomb.description: This section of the crypt is partially flooded with stagnant, murky water. Sarcophagi jut out of the water like islands. The air is heavy with the smell of mildew.

guard_tower_base.name: Guard Tower Base
guard_tower_base.description: The base of a ruined guard tower. Rubble blocks most of the interior, but a narrow, unstable staircase seems to lead upwards.

guard_tower_top.name: Guard Tower Top
guard_tower_top.description: From the precarious top of the ruined tower, you get a view of the surrounding ruins and the dense forest canopy stretching out in all directions. The wind whistles through the broken stones.

library_ruins.name: Library Ruins
library_ruins.description: This collapsed building might have once been a repository of knowledge. Scraps of decayed parchment and broken shelves litter the floor amidst the rubble.

items.name: Burnt Scroll
items.description: A fragile scroll, mostly destroyed by fire and time. Only a few cryptic symbols remain legible.

scriptorium.name: Ruined Scriptorium
scriptorium.description: A smaller room adjoining the library, likely where scribes worked. Stone desks are overturned, and dried inkwells lie scattered among the debris.

items.name: Broken Stylus
items.description: An intricate stylus made of bone, now broken in two.

mountains.name: Frostpeak Mountains
mountains.description: The jagged peaks of the Frostpeak range loom over the region. The air is thin and cold, and snow persists year-round on the higher slopes.

mine_exit.name: Abandoned Mine Exit
mine_exit.description: You emerge from the darkness of the mine shaft onto a windswept mountainside. The entrance is partially collapsed behind you. A narrow, treacherous path leads upwards.

rocky_ledge.name: Rocky Ledge
rocky_ledge.description: A narrow ledge clings to the mountainside, offering a dizzying view of the valley below. Loose rocks make footing uncertain.

high_pass.name: High Mountain Pass
high_pass.description: A narrow pass winds between towering peaks. The wind howls fiercely here, biting through your clothes. The path continues precariously upwards.

crevasse_edge.name: Edge of a Crevasse
crevasse_edge.description: The path skirts the edge of a deep, icy crevasse. A blast of freezing air rises from the depths.

summit.name: Frostpeak Summit
summit.description: The highest point for miles around. The view is breathtaking, stretching across forests, rivers, and distant lands. An ancient, weathered shrine stands here, half-buried in snow. A barely visible cleft leads down to the north.

items.name: Weathered Offering
items.description: A small, carved stone left at the shrine long ago. It feels strangely peaceful to hold.

frozen_waterfall.name: Frozen Waterfall
frozen_waterfall.description: A massive waterfall, frozen solid into shimmering blue ice, clings to the mountainside. The air here is intensely cold. It might be possible to climb the ice, but it looks dangerous.

ice_cave_entrance.name: Ice Cave Entrance
ice_cave_entrance.description: Behind the frozen waterfall lies the entrance to a hidden cave formed entirely of ice. The walls glimmer, reflecting light in strange ways.

ice_cave.name: Glacial Cave
ice_cave.description: Inside the ice cave, the temperature plummets. The air is still and silent. Elaborate formations of ice resemble frozen sculptures.

ice_cave_chamber.name: Inner Ice Chamber
ice_cave_chamber.description: Deeper within the ice cave, the ice walls seem older and thicker. Something large appears to be frozen within the ice in the center of the chamber.

hidden_valley_entrance.name: Hidden Valley Entrance
hidden_valley_entrance.description: A narrow cleft between rocks, easily missed, leads down from the summit into a sheltered area. Warmer air drifts up from below.

hidden_valley.name: Verdant Hidden Valley
hidden_valley.description: Surprisingly sheltered from the harsh mountain weather, this small valley is lush and green. A clear stream runs through it, and unusual alpine flowers bloom.

items.name: Frostpetal Bloom
items.description: A rare alpine flower that thrives in cold, sheltered places. Said to have potent restorative properties.

valley_cave.name: Small Valley Cave
valley_cave.description: A small, dry cave at the northern end of the hidden valley. Looks like it might have been used as a shelter recently.

items.name: Old Campfire Ashes
items.description: The cold ashes of a small campfire.

swamp.name: Murkwater Swamp
swamp.description: A vast, humid swamp stretching south of the Silver River. Twisted trees draped in moss rise from stagnant water, and the air buzzes with insects.

marsh_edge.name: Marsh Edge
marsh_edge.description: The firm ground of the riverbank gives way to soggy marshland. The air grows heavy and humid, filled with the croaking of frogs and the buzzing of insects. A narrow, muddy path leads deeper in.

willow_grove.name: Weeping Willow Grove
willow_grove.description: A grove of weeping willow trees stands near the marsh edge, their long branches trailing into the water.

stagnant_pool.name: Stagnant Pool
stagnant_pool.description: A large pool of dark, unmoving water blocks the path. Bubbles occasionally rise to the surface with a soft 'plop'. Strange, pale roots twist through the muck.

muddy_trail.name: Muddy Trail
muddy_trail.description: A slippery trail of thick mud winds southwards. It's difficult to keep your footing.

mangrove_thicket.name: Mangrove Thicket
mangrove_thicket.description: A dense thicket of mangrove trees with tangled roots creating a maze-like environment. Progress is slow and difficult, and it's easy to get turned around.

items.name: Pale Fungus
items.description: A cluster of pale, rubbery fungi growing on a rotting log. It looks vaguely unwholesome.

lizard_den.name: Giant Lizard Den
lizard_den.description: A large burrow dug into a muddy bank. Large reptilian tracks lead into the opening. It smells unpleasant.

items.name: Large Scale
items.description: A tough, greenish scale, likely shed by a large lizard.

sunken_structure.name: Sunken Structure
sunken_structure.description: The top of an old stone structure juts out from the murky water. Most of it has sunk into the swamp, but carvings near the waterline suggest it predates the village. The path seems to continue south into deeper mire.

flooded_ruin.name: Flooded Ruin Interior
flooded_ruin.description: Submerged within the sunken structure, this room is filled with murky water and debris. Visibility is extremely limited.

deep_swamp.name: Deep Swamp Mire
deep_swamp.description: The path dissolves into treacherous mire. Twisted cypress trees rise from the muck, their roots like grasping claws. Visibility is poor due to thick fog and buzzing insects.

whispering_reeds.name: Whispering Reeds
whispering_reeds.description: Tall reeds grow thickly here, whispering secrets as the wind sighs through them. It's hard to see far in any direction.

quicksand_pit.name: Quicksand Pit
quicksand_pit.description: A deceptively calm-looking pool of mud. Ripples suggest movement beneath the surface. Getting too close looks extremely dangerous. Something shiny is partially submerged near the edge.

items.name: Mud-Covered Brooch
items.description: A fancy brooch, caked in thick mud. If cleaned, it might be quite valuable.

ancient_bog.name: Ancient Bog
ancient_bog.description: This area feels unnaturally old. The water is black and still, preserving fallen trees from centuries past. The air is heavy and silent, save for the hum of insects. A path seems to lead south, towards the smell of salt.

farmland.name: Rolling Hills Farmland
farmland.description: Fertile fields stretch out under an open sky, tended by hardworking farmers. The air smells of crops and earth. The Silver River lies to the west.

farm_bridge.name: Old Stone Bridge
farm_bridge.description: A sturdy stone bridge arches over the Silver River, connecting the village to the farmlands. You can see the Riverside docks to the west and wheat fields to the east.

wheat_field.name: Whispering Wheat Field
wheat_field.description: A vast field of golden wheat stretches as far as the eye can see, rustling gently in the breeze. A path cuts through it towards a distant farmhouse visible to the north.

farmhouse_path.name: Path to Farmhouse
farmhouse_path.description: A well-trodden path leads towards a simple but sturdy farmhouse with smoke curling from its chimney.

vegetable_garden.name: Vegetable Garden
vegetable_garden.description: Neat rows of vegetables grow in this well-tended garden beside the farmhouse path. Carrots, potatoes, and greens flourish here.

items.name: Fresh Carrot
items.description: A crisp orange carrot, pulled fresh from the earth.

farmhouse_yard.name: Farmhouse Yard
farmhouse_yard.description: A tidy yard surrounds the farmhouse. Chickens peck at the ground, and tools lean against the wall. The farmhouse door looks welcoming.

barn_entrance.name: Barn Entrance
barn_entrance.description: The large double doors of a wooden barn stand before you. The smell of hay and animals comes from within.

barn_interior.name: Barn Interior
barn_interior.description: Inside the barn, stalls line the walls, some containing animals. Hay is piled high in a loft above. Farming equipment is stored neatly in corners.

items.name: Pitchfork
items.description: A sturdy pitchfork used for moving hay.

pumpkin_patch.name: Pumpkin Patch
pumpkin_patch.description: Large orange pumpkins lie scattered amongst tangled vines in this fertile patch of ground. Some look ripe for picking.

items.name: Large Pumpkin
items.description: A heavy orange pumpkin, good for carving or cooking. Might provide some sustenance.

scarecrow_field.name: Field with Scarecrow
scarecrow_field.description: A lonely scarecrow made of straw and old clothes stands guard over a patch of corn.

orchard_edge.name: Edge of the Orchard
orchard_edge.description: Rows of apple trees begin here, stretching eastward. The scent of ripe apples hangs in the air.

apple_orchard.name: Apple Orchard
apple_orchard.description: Gnarled apple trees grow in neat rows, laden with fruit. Bees buzz lazily among the branches. The ground is soft with fallen leaves. A path leads east, climbing towards rocky hills.

items.name: Ripe Apple
items.description: A crisp, juicy red apple, freshly picked.

beekeepers_corner.name: Beekeeper's Corner
beekeepers_corner.description: Several wooden beehives stand in a quiet corner of the orchard. The air hums with the sound of bees.

foothills.name: Windy Foothills
foothills.description: The land rises from the fertile farms into rolling, grassy hills dotted with rocky outcrops. Sheep graze on the slopes, watched over by solitary shepherds.

grassy_slope.name: Grassy Slope
grassy_slope.description: A wide, open slope covered in tough grasses and heather, climbing steadily upwards. The wind is stronger here. You can see the farmland below to the west.

items.name: Wild Herbs
items.description: A bundle of fragrant wild herbs. Might be useful for cooking or alchemy.

windy_ridge.name: Windy Ridge
windy_ridge.description: The top of the hill forms a long, windswept ridge. The view is expansive, showing the farmlands, the river, and the distant mountains.

rocky_outcrop.name: Rocky Outcrop
rocky_outcrop.description: A cluster of large, weathered rocks juts from the hillside, offering some shelter from the wind and a good view of the surroundings.

items.name: Sharp Flint
items.description: A piece of flint with a naturally sharp edge. Could be used as a makeshift tool or weapon.

hilltop_cave_entrance.name: Hilltop Cave Entrance
hilltop_cave_entrance.description: A small, dark opening is nestled amongst the rocks near the hilltop. A cool draft emerges.

hilltop_cave.name: Hilltop Cave
hilltop_cave.description: A small, damp cave inside the hill. It doesn't seem to go very deep.

shepherds_hut.name: Shepherd's Hut
shepherds_hut.description: A small, simple hut made of stone and turf, built into the hillside. A thin trail of smoke rises from a chimney hole. It looks occupied.

sheep_pen.name: Sheep Pen
sheep_pen.description: A fenced area next to the shepherd's hut where sheep are kept at night. The ground is well-trodden.

items.name: Tuft of Wool
items.description: A small tuft of sheep's wool caught on the fence.

coastal_path.name: Salt-Kissed Path
coastal_path.description: The fetid swamp gives way to brackish marshes and eventually sandy shores as the path winds towards the coast.

mudflats.name: Mudflats
mudflats.description: The path crosses wide mudflats exposed by the receding tide. The air smells strongly of salt and decaying seaweed. Seabirds cry overhead.

shipwreck_debris.name: Shipwreck Debris
shipwreck_debris.description: Fragments of a wrecked ship lie scattered across the mudflats, half-buried in the silt. Rotted timbers and rusted metal poke out.

salt_marsh.name: Salt Marsh
salt_marsh.description: Tough grasses and reeds grow in dense clumps, adapted to the salty, waterlogged ground. Small crabs scuttle between pools left by the tide.

tidal_pool.name: Tidal Pool
tidal_pool.description: A shallow pool of seawater trapped among the marsh grasses. Small sea creatures might live here.

items.name: Pretty Seashell
items.description: A colorful, intact seashell.

beach_approach.name: Beach Approach
beach_approach.description: The ground becomes sandy underfoot. You can hear the rhythmic sound of waves crashing nearby. Ahead, you see the sturdy wooden walls of a coastal settlement.

items.name: Piece of Driftwood
items.description: A smooth piece of wood, worn by the sea and sand.

sandy_beach.name: Sandy Beach
sandy_beach.description: A wide stretch of sandy beach meets the sea. Waves gently lap at the shore. Kelp and shells are strewn along the high tide line.

sea_cave_entrance.name: Sea Cave Entrance
sea_cave_entrance.description: At the base of a low cliff, a dark opening leads into a sea cave. The sound of waves echoes from within.

sea_cave.name: Sea Cave
sea_cave.description: Inside the sea cave, the air is cool and damp. Water pools on the floor, rising and falling with the tide.

portbridge.name: Portbridge
portbridge.description: A bustling port town built where the Silver River meets the sea. Its docks teem with sailors and merchants, and the smell of salt and fish hangs heavy in the air.

town_gate_south.name: Portbridge South Gate
town_gate_south.description: A sturdy wooden gatehouse guards the southern entrance to Portbridge. Guards eye newcomers warily. Beyond the gate, the town looks busy and somewhat rough.

harbor_district.name: Harbor District
harbor_district.description: Warehouses and taverns line the cobbled streets leading to the noisy docks. Sailors shout, gulls cry, and the air is thick with the smell of tar, fish, and foreign spices.

items.name: Coiled Rope
items.description: A length of sturdy hemp rope, coiled neatly.

smugglers_tunnel_entrance.name: Smuggler's Tunnel Entrance
smugglers_tunnel_entrance.description: Hidden behind loose crates near the docks is a dark opening leading down into a crudely dug tunnel.

smugglers_tunnel.name: Smuggler's Tunnel
smugglers_tunnel.description: A narrow, damp tunnel running beneath the harbor district. It smells of seawater and stale air.

underground_cache.name: Underground Cache
underground_cache.description: The tunnel opens into a small chamber where illicit goods might be stored. Some empty crates and barrels are stacked here.

items.name: Dubious Cargo
items.description: A small, locked chest containing unknown contents. It looks valuable but likely stolen.

fish_market.name: Fish Market
fish_market.description: An open-air market dominated by stalls selling the day's catch. Fishermen haggle loudly over prices, and the ground is slick with seawater and fish scales.

pier_1.name: Fishing Pier
pier_1.description: A long wooden pier extending out over the water, used by local fishermen. Fishing lines dangle into the sea.

sailors_rest_inn.name: The Sailor's Rest Inn
sailors_rest_inn.description: A large, rowdy inn catering to seafarers. The common room is filled with loud conversation, laughter, and the clatter of tankards. Fights occasionally break out.

inn_rooms.name: Inn Upper Floor
inn_rooms.description: A narrow corridor above the Sailor's Rest, lined with doors to small, basic rooms.

shipwright.name: Shipwright's Yard
shipwright.description: The sounds of sawing and hammering fill the air. Large wooden skeletons of ships under construction dominate the yard. Wood shavings litter the ground.

lumber_storage.name: Lumber Storage
lumber_storage.description: Large stacks of timber and planks are stored here, ready for use by the shipwright.

town_center_portbridge.name: Portbridge Town Center
town_center_portbridge.description: The central area of Portbridge is slightly more orderly than the harbor. Merchant stalls and administrative buildings cluster around a small square.

port_authority.name: Port Authority Office
port_authority.description: A stern-looking building where harbourmasters manage dock traffic and collect tariffs. Clerks bustle about inside.

npc_tavern_keeper.name: Barlin the Tavern Keeper
npc_tavern_keeper.description: A robust man with a thick beard and friendly eyes. He keeps his tavern in good order and knows all the local gossip.

item.name: Tankard of Ale
item.description: A foaming tankard of locally brewed ale. It smells of hops and barley.

dialog.greeting: Welcome to the Drunken Dragon! Can I get you a drink or a hot meal?
dialog.drink: I've got ale, mead, and wine. The ale's brewed right here in town.
dialog.food: Our cook makes a mean venison stew, and the bread's fresh from the baker this morning.
dialog.rumors: Have you heard about the missing supplies? The last merchant caravan lost an entire wagon's worth of goods. Some say it was bandits, others blame forest creatures.
dialog.town: Riverside's a peaceful place, most of the time. We get travelers passing through on their way upriver to the city.
dialog.forest: I wouldn't venture too deep into those woods alone. Strange things happen there, especially at night.
dialog.cellar_key: Ah, the cellar key! Found it, did you? Must have dropped it somewhere. You can keep it, might be useful if you need to... access the cellar quickly.
dialog.portbridge: Portbridge, down by the sea? Rough place, full of sailors and smugglers, or so I hear. Very different from our quiet village.

npc_tavern_keeper.default_dialog: The {name} is busy wiping down the bar.

npc_blacksmith.name: Grenda the Blacksmith
npc_blacksmith.description: A tall, muscular woman with her hair tied back and soot-stained arms. Her steady hands and keen eye produce some of the finest metalwork in the region.

dialog.greeting: Welcome to my forge. Need something repaired or looking to buy?
dialog.weapons: I can make you a fine sword or axe if you've got the coin. Quality steel, properly tempered.
dialog.armor: I've got leather and chainmail available. Full plate's a special order, takes time to get right.
dialog.repair: I can fix that up for you. Just leave it with me and come back tomorrow.
dialog.business: Business is steady enough. Always need for good tools and weapons.
dialog.missing_supplies: Aye, there was good steel on that caravan. I was expecting a shipment that never arrived.
dialog.mountains: The Frostpeaks? Cold and dangerous up there. Heard tell of old mines, but most are played out or collapsed. Not worth the climb unless you're hunting griffins... or trouble.

npc_blacksmith.default_dialog: The {name} nods but continues working at the forge.

npc_village_elder.name: Elder Thorne
npc_village_elder.description: An elderly person with silver hair and a dignified bearing. Despite their age, there's a sharp intelligence in their eyes and a commanding presence in their manner.

dialog.greeting: Greetings, traveler. What brings you to our humble village?
dialog.village: Riverside has stood here for five generations. We're simple folk, making our living from the river and the land.
dialog.history: Our village was founded by refugees from the great war to the north. They sought peace, and found it here by the river.
dialog.missing_supplies: Yes, it's quite troubling. A whole wagon of supplies vanished between here and the crossroads. We need those supplies for winter. If you could investigate, the village would be most grateful. Any clue, no matter how small, could help.
dialog.reward: Find our missing supplies, and you'll be well compensated. The merchants' guild has offered a bounty, and I can add a personal reward as well.
dialog.forest: The Whispering Woods have always held secrets. Our ancestors knew to respect its boundaries. Some say there are ancient ruins deep within.
dialog.ruins: The ruins in the forest? Aye, they are spoken of in whispers. Older than memory. Best left undisturbed, some say. Too many shadows linger there.
dialog.swamp: The Murkwater? A foul place. Little of value there, and much that can harm you. Best avoided.
dialog.farmland: The farms across the river provide much of our sustenance. Good, honest folk work that land.
dialog.portbridge: I have little dealing with Portbridge. It's a place of transient folk and shifting loyalties, unlike our steadfast community here.

npc_village_elder.default_dialog: The {name} considers your words carefully before responding.

npc_merchant.name: Talia the Merchant
npc_merchant.description: A well-dressed woman with a quick smile and shrewd eyes. She travels between villages with her wagon of goods, bringing news as well as merchandise.

dialog.greeting: Well met! Looking to buy or sell? I've got wares from up and down the river.
dialog.goods: I've got cloth from the city, spices from the eastern lands, tools, trinkets, and more. Take a look!
dialog.buy: Show me what you're selling, and I'll give you a fair price.
dialog.news: News from the city? The new tax on river trade has everyone in an uproar. The merchants' guild is petitioning the king.
dialog.bandits: There's been more bandit activity on the north road. I hired guards for this trip, cost me a pretty coin.
dialog.missing_supplies: I heard about that. Bad business, that. Makes all of us merchants nervous. Who's to say our goods won't be next?
dialog.travel: I travel the river road mostly. Safer than the deep woods, usually. Though I've heard odd tales about the swamp downstream... nothing I'd care to investigate myself.
dialog.portbridge: Portbridge? Oh yes, I trade there sometimes, though you have to watch your back. Good place to find exotic goods brought in by sea, if you know where to look. The coastal path south from the swamp will get you there, eventually.

npc_merchant.default_dialog: The {name} is busy arranging her wares.

npc_forest_hermit.name: Old Bryn
npc_forest_hermit.description: A hunched figure in tattered clothes with a wild beard and hair. Despite his unkempt appearance, his eyes are clear and knowing.

dialog.greeting: Eh? Who's there? Don't get many visitors out this way.
dialog.forest: These woods have a spirit to them, if you know how to listen. Been living here for twenty years, and they still surprise me.
dialog.village: Bah, too many people in that village. Too much noise. I prefer the company of trees.
dialog.missing_supplies: Supplies? Hrmph. Saw something strange a few nights back. Lights moving through the trees, deeper in than most dare to go. Towards the old stones... Not natural, those lights.
dialog.cave: There's caves in the hills yonder. Old caves, deep ones. Folk say they're haunted, but it's just echoes playing tricks. Still, wouldn't go too deep if I were you. Lead all sorts of places... some up to the cold peaks.
dialog.ruins: The old ruins? Aye, they're real enough. Hidden in the deepest part of the woods, northwest of here. Built by who? Not men, I'd wager. The stones are too perfectly fit, and the markings... not like any writing I've seen.

npc_forest_hermit.default_dialog: The {name} mutters to himself and doesn't seem to hear you.
